# Alert Animation - Attention-grabbing pattern
# Alternating X pattern for warnings

name=Alert
loop=true

# Frame 1: X pattern
frame=10000001,01000010,00100100,00011000,00011000,00100100,01000010,10000001,150

# Frame 2: Inverse X pattern
frame=01111110,10111101,11011011,11100111,11100111,11011011,10111101,01111110,150

# Frame 3: Full
frame=11111111,11111111,11111111,11111111,11111111,11111111,11111111,11111111,100

# Frame 4: Empty
frame=00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,100
